text: Rearrange the points on the graph so that no lines
meet and no point is sitting on any of the lines.
When the graph turns green, the level is complete.
An arrow has appared in the bottom right corner.
Push it to advance to the next level.
Once the arrow appears, it will remain on screen
even if you twist the graph back up.
You got the gist of it. Now try this one.
That's it. Good luck, you are on your own now.
